title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 318 - Continuous Service
content:

State Regulations
§ 318.1 - Background
§ 318.2 - Establishing eligibility for retirement benefits
§ 318.3 - Establishing eligibility for death benefits
§ 318.4 - Leave under the family and medical leave act of 1993

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 318

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
